mapper.insert: INSERT INTO boosting_detail (orderId, businessType, status, boostingTask, progress, createTime, lastUpdateTime) VALUES (#{bean.orderId}, #{bean.businessType}, #{bean.status}, #{bean.boostingTask}, #{bean.progress}, #{bean.createTime}, #{bean.lastUpdateTime}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE boostingTask = #{bean.boostingTask}, status = 'N'
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(temp.total) from (SELECT COUNT(*) total FROM boosting_detail WHERE orderId = #{orderId} AND status != 'D' UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(*) total FROM multi_progress WHERE orderId = #{orderId} AND status != 'D') temp
